channel.title: Item id`s?
channel.description:
Hey people,
this is my problem... iv got a client with dragon claws model... now i want it put into a bluurs client that i have already edited to my like.
how whould i swap it around so i can have the same dragon claw model in the bluurs client?

item.title: Item id`s?
item.dc:creator: @x_power_x x power x
item.description:
@x_power_x wrote:

Find the model & ints. Add to client, add to server. Add the .gz file to your models folder in your client, go on server type ( add model $ ( $$$ = model id E .G 12474.gz) than add the description to your item.cfg, and your item.java as a wearable item. Than add the interface, special, and other crap later on.

Read full topic

item.title: Item id`s?
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

you need the model and the ints

Read full topic
